title: "Exploring Hypnosis, Quantum Change, and Sexual Spirituality"
first_phrase: This text delves into the use of waking hypnosis to control and enhance sexual experiences, and explains how to bring a partner out of this state of heightened suggestibility. The author goes on to describe the level of quantum change, where no direct suggestions are given but conditions are created for new ways of feeling and being. The text also touches on the concept of divinity and the role of sexual ritual in certain sects.

last_phrase: En conclusión, el cambio a nivel cuántico puede ser una forma natural de mejorar la sexualidad y desarrollar una esfera más profunda en este ámbito.
